column4: hi. does anybody know if ubuntu 10.10 will support toshiba laptops (with the overheating problem) ?
you mean the *recalled* toshiba laptops? ;)  Send it back before it catches on fire!

http://www.thirdage.com/news/toshiba-recall-burn-hazard-t-series-notebooks_9-4-201 <- theres a BIOS update but that will only shut down the power supply if it happens, the solution is to send it back to Toshiba
what overheating problem are you having?
that sounds like power management.  Windows may be idling the processor and Ubuntu may not.  I don't know, see what others say too.
I honestly have no idea.   I don't have experience with Wubi.
